styleDefault.description: Note that specifies a style is 'preferred'.

labelAlwaysShowIcon.message: Always show page action icon even page styles not found

labelRememberSelected.message: Use cookies to remember the selected page style

labelClosePopupAfterSwitch.message: Close popup window after a switch

noteFixChrome.message: Chrome picks incorrect default style on some pages while Opera and Firefox not. Check this option to try to fix Chrome. If the fix breaks the page's default style, uncheck this option.
noteFixChrome.description: Text of the explanation of option 'fixChrome'.

noteAlwaysShowIcon.message: The extension's icon will be hidden if the current page contains no extral page style. Check this option if you want to use the 'No Style' feature on those pages.
noteAlwaysShowIcon.description: Text of the explanation of option 'alwaysShowIcon'.

noteRememberSelected.message: When checked, the selected style will be remembered when you reload the page or turn to other pages on the same domain. Uncheck this option if this extension does abnormal auto-switch. This option will trigger a fix on Chrome.
noteRememberSelected.description: Text of the explanation of option 'rememberSelected'.

noteClosePopupAfterSwitch.message: You have to click somewhere outside the popup window to close it after a switch. Check this option will make the popup window closed automatically after a switch.
noteClosePopupAfterSwitch.description: Text of the explanation of option 'closePopupAfterSwitch'.

noteNoStyleWorkWithFrames.message: By default, 'No Style' works only on the top frame. Check this option if you want it to work into all other frames. Swith to a default or any alternate style will trigger a 'Default Style' switch on other frames
noteNoStyleWorkWithFrames.description: Text of the explanation of option 'noStyleWorkWithFrames'.

textNoStylesFound.description: Text shown on popup if no page styles found.

messageSettingsSaved.description: Message shown on a javascript alert that tells the user all settings are saved.
